text: Hi Tony. Your CG Samsung unit looks good. What exactly is it suppose to be?  I have some ideas to keep improving it, but  I will also ask my 3D colleague his opinion and get back to you.

We were asked to create an inanimate 3D model and incorporate it into a live action shot , the perspective is a bit off but I didn’t have the opportunity to re-render for the deadline, on top of that, after rendering out on Nuke, i got the footage into after effects and added cc rain to set the mood and then played a bit with other effects. ( i think i used CC Composite to add to the mood). And the “eye “ project is a limb replacement project where i will be replacing my head with an eye.
